articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
PCIe 4.0 SSDs are a great option for cutting down game load times, especially in this exciting time of actual DirectStorage 1.1 games being around, and today there's a good deal on the Netac NV7000, a high-end 'second-gen' PCIe 4.0 SSD that can hit read speeds up to 7000MB/s and write speeds of 6700MB/s - impressive stuff. 
It's down from £196 to £157, thanks to a 20% off voucher you tick on the product page at Amazon UK, and well worth picking up for that price - especially as the drive comes with a heatsink attached. 
Read more
articles.title: PCIe 4.0 SSDs are great - here's a 2TB model for £157 after a 20% off voucher

articles.author: Alice Bell
articles.description:
Last week, I finished the free Tomb Raider DLC for PowerWash Simulator, in which you pressure-blast scum off Lara Croft's ancestral home. It's a great DLC, not just because it has loads of nods to the older Tomb Raider games, but also because if you're just in it for the powerwashing, you've got some lovely levels to clean, with nooks and crannies and satisfying walls to scour. My favourite thing about it, however, is that it kind of canonically confirms Lara is an ass.
Read more
articles.title: The PowerWash Sim Tomb Raider DLC is great and/because Lara is the worst

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Na úvodní článek o frameworku Kafka Connect dnes navážeme a budeme se zabývat definicí a kontrolou schématu zpráv, což je v oblasti heterogenních architektur založených na mikroslužbách velmi užitečná a žádaná vlastnost.
articles.title: Kafka Connect: definice a kontrola schématu zpráv

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Otevřený projekt OpenEnroth je reimplentací RPG Might and Magic 6, 7 a 8. Studio PixelJAM Games otevřelo zdrojové kódy své hry Dino Run DX. Zelda3 je klon hry The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past vytvořený reverzním inženýrstvím.
articles.title: Reimplementace Might and Magic, Dino Run DX je open source

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Josef Jebavý)
articles.description: Pořídil jsem si nový notebook, jehož výrobce oficiálně podporuje Linux. Jedná se o model Tuxedo Pulse 15 Gen2, o kterém jsem se po měsících používání rozhodl sepsat své dlouhodobé zkušenosti.
articles.title: Notebook Tuxedo Pulse 15 Gen2: pracant připravený na Linux

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Sonda do světa otevřeného softwaru. Dnes si představíme 2D CAD pro GNOME, vizualizujeme si zvuk, synchronizujeme si soubory na cloudu a uděláme si pár poznámek. Chybět nebude ani tradiční blbinka.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (15. 2. 2023): synchronizujte soubory v cloudu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Ve druhém článku o vývoji programů pro ZX Spectrum si popíšeme mikroprocesor Zilog Z80 a následně si ukážeme, jak realizovat a následně optimalizovat jednoduché počítané programové smyčky v assembleru.
articles.title: Vývoj pro ZX Spectrum: mikroprocesor Zilog Z80 a smyčky v assembleru

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V dnešním článku o filtraci síťového provozu pomocí nástroje Firewalld si ukážeme, jak definovat politiky pro komunikaci mezi různými zónami. Z filtru pro koncové zařízení tak uděláme klasický síťový firewall.
articles.title: Firewalld: filtrace provozu mezi zónami pomocí politik

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: CESNET CERTS)
articles.description:
Tentokrát si můžeme přečíst o mnohém zranitelném softwaru, o podvržených
knihovnách, o útocích hackerů i o zločincích opakovaně zneužívajících šifrovanou komunikaci, kteří přesto neunikli spravedlnosti.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: nehledejte software ke stažení pomocí Google

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Vznikla speciální zájmová skupina Fedora Asahi SIG, která se chce zaměřit na počítače od firmy Apple.Canonical se připojil k Academy Software Foundation jako prémiový člen. Vzniklo otevřené grafické uživatelské prostředí Calmira Reborn.
articles.title: Fedora se zaměří na Apple, Canonical je prémiový člen ASWF

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: KDE Plasma 5.27 LTS za dveřmi, Plasma 6.0 na cestě, Transmission 4.0 přechází na čistší C++ a přidává BitTorrent v2, Audacious 4.3 v Beta verzi, FFmpeg chystá více AVX-512, vyplatí se zejména pro AV1.
articles.title: FFmpeg chce víc AVX-512 optimalizací, Audacious 4.3 nabídne PipeWire, Qt6 i GTK3

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Dnešní článek bude opět o softwarové architektuře a filozofii frameworku PHP Jet. Tentokrát se podíváme na zajímavé téma Dependency Injection, továren a další zajímavé věci.
articles.title: PHP Jet: Dependency Injection, továrny a tak dále

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: V posledních měsících si uživatelé Toru mohli všímat problémů s výkonem celé sítě. Správci projektu Tor nyní informují, že síť strávila posledních minimálně 7 měsíců pod řadou DDoS útoků.
articles.title: Projekt Tor je už nejméně 7 měsíců pod DDoS útoky

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: V nové verzi Firefoxu je podporován import záložek nejen z Edge, Chrome či Safari, ale také z Opery, Opery GX a Vivaldi. Na Windows používá stodesítka GPU sandboxing (Mozilla na tomto místě dodává, že kvůli chybě v X-Mouse Button Control (XMBC) může zlobit scrollování myší – autor o tom ví, připravuje opravu).
articles.title: Firefox 110 přináší lepší WebGL a akceleraci na GPU

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Populární softwarový dekodér ideo formátu AV1, dav1d, povýšil na verzi 1.1. Tvůrci v ní přinášejí další optimalizace pro (nej)novější instrukční sady, z nichž většina se týká balíku AVX-512, podporované vedle vybraných Intel CPU také nejnovějšími Ryzeny 7000, resp. Zen 4 CPU obecně.
articles.title: dav1d 1.1 s dalšími AVX-512 optimalizacemi

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Kubernetes je dnes nejrozšířenější platformou na hostovaní Docker kontejnerů a je podporován velkými hráči na trhu (Google, Amazon, Microsoft) skrz Cloud Native Computing Foundation. Kuberneres pro provoz používají všechny velikosti firem, od startupu po korporace. Pojďme se naučit jej používat na dvoudenním kurzu Úvod do Kubernetes, který proběhne v naší pražské školicí místnosti ve dnech 20. a 21. února. Školení proběhne v naší pražské školicí místnosti a můžete se ho zúčastnit i online.
articles.title: Naučte se Kubernetes na našem dvoudenním školení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Jelikož je API Vulkan důležité jak pro Intel, tak pro AMD, dospěli vývojáři Blenderu k jedinému možnému závěru: síly v letošním roce v rámci prací na verzi Blender 4.0 – a o jejich velikosti rozhodne objem dostupného financování – budou primárně vrženy na alespoň nějakou funkční podporu API Vulkan. Na optimalizacích se pak začne pracovat následně.
articles.title: Cíl pro Blender 4.0: podpora API Vulkan, optimalizace až poté

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Vývojáři Microsoftu dokončili potřebný kód v systémech Mesa a Direct3D, který umožňuje využívat v linuxových aplikacích hardwarovou akceleraci kódování a dekódování videa při běhu na Windows přes Windows Subsystem for Linux 2.0 (WSL 2.0). Je k tomu potřeba patřičná verze Mesa, Direct3D 12 i ovladačů pro GPU.
articles.title: Microsoft Windows dostaly akceleraci videa ve WSL 2.0 přes Mesa/D3D12 a VA-API

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Vývojáři desktopového prostředí KDE slaví, neb konečně vydali Plasmu 5.27, poslední vydání postavené na frameworku Qt5, které je současně LTS a bude udržováno do vydání příští LTS verze, patrně tedy až někdy do roku 2024.
articles.title: KDE Plasma 5.27 LTS je tu, poslední Qt5 vydání

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Michal Kubeček)
articles.description: Bakalářská práce Jana Strehmela z Institutu teoretické informatiky v Karlsruhe se snaží statisticky vyhodnotit korelaci mezi výskytem neslušných výrazů ve zdrojových textech open source projektů a kvalitou jejich kódu.
articles.title: Vliv vulgarit na kvalitu kódu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Jak jsme psali začátkem tohoto roku, Raspberry Pi Pico W má v sobě čip Infineon CYW43439 s podporou WiFi 4 a Bluetooth 5.2 LE. Podpora Bluetooth však nebyla v Pico C SDK. To se změnilo v sobotu, kdy vyšel SDK 1.5.0.
articles.title: Raspberry Pi Pico W s podporou Bluetooth LE

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: O přepisování GNU Coreutils do Rustu jsme tu již před rokem psali. Koncem ledna vyšla verze 0.0.17. Nově mohou cp a mv ukazovat postup operace (progress bar). To je kvůli kompatibilitě s GNU Coreutils ve výchozím stavu vypnuto a je potřeba zapnout -g nebo  --progress.
articles.title: Pokračuje portace GNU Coreutils do Rustu, cp a mv ukazují postup

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Nedávno si vývojáři jádra začali stěžovat, že pro kompilaci jádra s allyesconfig, tedy se vším zapnutým,  již nestačí 32 GB RAM a začíná úřadovat OOM Killer. Vývojář Peter Zijlstra se podíval na objtool. To je nástroj linuxového jádra, který pracuje s ELF binárními soubory.
articles.title: Optimalizace objtool pro kompilaci jádra

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Versatile Video Coding (VVC) H.266 je tu od roku 2020. Slibuje poloviční bitrate oproti staršímu HEVC H.265 obzvláště pro 4K a 8K. Fraunhofer HHI pracuje na open source dekodéru a enkodéru s názvem VVenC. Je napsaný v C++ s C rozhraním. Používá SIMD instrukce a pomocí SIMD Everywhere je akcelerovaný i na ARM s instrukcemi NEON.
articles.title: Open source dekodér a enkodér pro H.266/VVC

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Nginx je dnes přibližně na třetině web serverů na internetu a toto číslo stále roste. Je výkonný, spolehlivý, má spoustu funkcí a dobře se spravuje. Pokud potřebujete dobrý web server pro svůj projekt, bude Nginx správnou volbou.
articles.title: Nasaďte moderní web server s Nginx (online školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Kompresní nástroj Facebooku zstd vyšel dnes asi po roce vývoje ve verzi 1.5.4. Mezi novinky patří vylepšený výkon dekomprese asi o 20 % na všech architekturách kromě amd64, kde je k dispozici již optimální kód v assembleru. Střední komprese s nastavením 5 – 12 je rychlejší o 4 – 13 %, komprese na procesorech ARM je rychlejší o 3 – 11 %.
articles.title: Zstd 1.5.4 s lepším výkonem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: anonymní)
articles.description: Ve středu 1. března 2023 od 18 hodin pořádá firma RTsoft workshop na téma Jak na čistý kód a škálovatelnou architekturu kódu. Akce proběhne v Plzni v nově otevřené budově TechTower, v SeedUp Space. Workshop je zdarma, pivo a malé občerstvení je zajištěno.
articles.title: Workshop v Plzni: jak na čistý kód a škálovatelnou architekturu kódu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Na Kickstarteru se objevil projekt Compute Blade. Jde o malé zásuvné servery s Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4, které můžete zastrkat do krabice a tu pak umístit do běžné serverové skříně. K dispozici jsou krabice na 4 moduly, na 10 modulů (šířka 10 palců) a na 20 modulů (standardní 1U 19 palců).
articles.title: Compute Blade: server z Raspberry Pi Compute Module do serverové skříně

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Nedávno jsme informovali o experimentálním jádře 6.1 pro Raspberry Pi. Včera pak bylo linuxové jádro 6.1 povýšeno na LTS jádro s prodlouženou podporou. Při této příležitosti bylo jádro 6.1 pro Raspberry pi přesunuto z větve next do výchozí větve.
articles.title: Experimentální jádro 6.1 pro Raspberry Pi - aktualizace

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Přijďte prozkoumat tajuplný svět hackingu a množství jeho jednotlivých zákoutí. Průvodcem na této cestě vám bude zkušený etický hacker s mnohaletou praxí, který se s vámi podělí o své zkušenosti. Stačí navštívit naše školení Hacking v praxi 1, na kterém proniknete do světa útočníků a jejich obětí. Školení proběhne v naší pražské školicí místnosti ve dnech 20. až 22. března.
articles.title: Hacking v praxi: od sociálního inženýrství po bankomaty (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři projektu Thunderbird zveřejnili na blogu plány na příští tři roky. Během té doby by chtěli zeštíhlit kód a učinit jej spolehlivějším, přepsat starý kód a dohnat technický dluh. Dále je v plánu kompletní přepsání uživatelského rozhraní a vytvoření jeho nové konzistentní podoby. Vývojáři by také chtěli přejít na pravidelný měsíční plán vydávání.
articles.title: Thunderbird plánuje během tří let kompletně předělat rozhraní

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Greg Kroah-Hartman už vloni na podzim naznačoval, že by jádro verze 6.1 mohlo být vybráno pro režim s dlouhou podporou (LTS). Obvykle se jím totiž stává poslední major verze vydaná v rámci kalendářního roku. Nyní to bylo oficiálně potvrzeno a jádro 6.1 bylo povýšeno na LTS a bude podporováno až do prosince 2026.
articles.title: Linuxové jádro 6.1 bylo povýšeno na jádro s dlouhou podporou (LTS)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Americký National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) oznámil, že rodina ověřených šifrovacích a hašovacích algoritmů známá jako Ascon bude standardizována pro aplikace lehké kryptografie. Vybrané algoritmy jsou určeny k ochraně informací vytvářených a přenášených internetem věcí (IoT), včetně mnoha různých drobných senzorů a akčních členů, uvádí NIST ve svém oznámení.
articles.title: NIST standardizuje šifrovací algoritmy Ascon pro IoT a drobná zařízení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Eric Curtin na své přednášce na konferenci FOSDEM upozornil na vznik nové pracovní skupiny (SIG – special interest group) zaměřené na provoz distribuce Fedora na počítačích od společnosti Apple s čipy architektury ARM. Cílem je pomoci komunitě Asahi s upstreamem a poskytnout Fedora Workstation založenou na ARM pro ty, kteří vlastní hardware s Apple Silicon, říká Curtin.
articles.title: Fedora Asahi SIG se zaměří na počítače firmy Apple

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Americký úřad Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) zveřejnil nástroj pro obnovu dat na serverech VMware ESXi, které byly napadeny ransomwarem ESXiArgs. Jedná se o shellový skript ESXiArgs-Recover, který je možné stáhnout na GitHubu. Na většině napadených serverů nedošlo k zašifrování virtuálních disků, ale jen konfiguračních souborů. Proto je možné pomocí skriptu jednoduše znovu vytvořit konfiguraci podle metadat a službu obnovit.
articles.title: Americká CISA zveřejnila nástroj pro obnovu serverů napadených ransomwarem ESXiArgs

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Tým Ivana Bartoše během nedávného předsednictví Česka v Radě EU uspořádal open source konferenci v Brně, kde vznikla deklarace, která mimo jiné počítá s tím, že se z moravské metropole stane národní centrum open source. Konkrétně zde má vzniknout Czech National OSPO – Open Source Program Office. To jsou jednotky, které si vytvářejí IT společnosti a veřejné instituce, aby udržovaly vztahy s open-source komunitou. O celém plánu dnes píše Lupa.cz.

articles.description: For the past few years Ubuntu developer Daniel van Vugt at Canonical has been working on dynamic triple buffering support for the GNOME desktop so that it will switch from double to triple buffering when the GPU is running behind in order to ultimately ramp up the GPU clock speeds / performance state in order to get back to delivering a fluid desktop experience. These triple buffering patches still haven't been upstreamed as of the GNOME 44 release due out next month, but the patches continue to be carried within Debian and Ubuntu among other distributions. An updated version of the code is now on the way to Debian and for April's Ubuntu 23.04 release...

TUXEDO OS was delivering some performance improvements over stock (K)Ubuntu 22.04, ships with TUXEDO's configuration utilities by default, and other refinements to this desktop OS using the KDE Plasma desktop by default. The team in Augsburg is now preparing to ship TUXEDO OS 2 in the near future while this week they made available a public test snapshot.

articles.author: Cheri Faulkner
articles.description:
Genji or Mercy?
For the first time ever, Blizzard has introduced a new and interactive experience to the world of Overwatch in the form of Loverwatch - Love Never Dies. This strictly non-canonical dating simulator is completely safe for work, unlike many fan creations in the Overwatch universe, and allows the player to interact with either Genji or Mei on romantic occasions set in various recognizable Overwatch map locations.
As a reward for completing the game, exclusive titles and in-game cosmetics will be granted depending on which options you choose. Up for grabs are the Hanzo Cupid's Kiss highlight introduction and cute titles which will automatically be applied to players' accounts. There are plenty of hidden Easter eggs, inside jokes, and a secret ending to discover, and finding all…
articles.title: Loverwatch, the Overwatch dating simulator is real, here’s how to play

articles.author: CJ Andriessen
articles.description:
I've got no strings on me
There are a lot of reasons I play video games. Sometimes it's to escape. Other times, I just want to feel challenged, to feel like I accomplished something for the day. Then there are the games I play out of habit having been introduced to the franchise in my youth. But mostly, I play games to stave off boredom. Because when I'm bored, I eat, and I don't want to boredom eat anymore. So I keep my hands busy with a controller, and my eyes distracted with the colorful images of whatever game I have loaded up on my console. Years ago, I would turn to games like The Sims to keep myself preoccupied, but over the last decade or so, I've found myself turning to a completely different genre of game to beat back the boredom: first-person dungeon crawlers.
Starting with Etri…
articles.title: Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society is a wonderful way to while away the hours

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Disasters ahoy
Artificial Disasters has announced that their “reversed city-builder” Flooded will be washing out to sea on March 15, 2023.
You might be wondering what a “reversed city-builder” means. For me, personally, it brought back memories of calling every single disaster down on my SimCity 2000 creations. However, Artificial Disasters is using the descriptor as a way of explaining the slowly disappearing terrain in Flooded. Don’t get too comfortable with your initial landmass because, over time, it will be washed away. The goal is to place your buildings carefully to escape the approaching waves.
[embed]https://youtu.be/qCA1hjRS9bU[/embed]
Tied into this are some RTS and rogue-lite elements. There are campaign, quickplay, and endless modes to tackle. The campaign is story-driven, having you build arks to travel the expanding oceans to figure out what is causing them to rise. You’ll have to defend yourself from other survivors out to plunder your settlements because even when faced with the end, humans will always be eager to destroy lives.
City-builders is one of my favorite relaxation genres. However, Flooded looks like it’s aiming to add an element of stress with its constantly ticking countdown. Still, I always enjoy a bit of progress to give a nice framework to the constant people-pleasing. If I have one hang-up, it’s that I’m not crazy about the art style. However, Artificial Disasters is a solo developer effort, and it can be difficult for one person to cover every aspect of design. It’s definitely not a deal-breaker for me..
Flooded hits PC on March 15, 2023. If you’d like to see if it’s your speed, a demo is available via Steam and GOG.
The post Reversed city-builder Flooded gushes into PC on March 15 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Reversed city-builder Flooded gushes into PC on March 15

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Good God... Y'alllllll!
Tomorrow will see Epic Games Store offer up yet another free game for its army of users, with any and all EGS customers able to pick up Daedalic Entertainment's quirky strategy sim Warpips for the very agreeable price of Absolutely Nothing. Huh, say it again.
https://youtu.be/hQRwUsxi2Pg
Developed by indie outfit Skirmish Mode Games and originally launched in spring 2022, Warpips is a fast-paced, tug-of-war strategy title, which offers players quick-to-learn, hard-to-master battles that choose to focus on the larger scale of chaos, rather than the time-consuming minutiae of most strategy sims. Warpips tasks players with building up a small army of infantry and vehicles, before diving into bombastic, fast-paced warfare, with a heavy emphasis on damage and destruction.
Sam Fisher need not apply.
Warpips will be available to download, free of charge, from Epic Games Store from February 16-23. Until the end of today, users still have the opportunity to bag themselves current freebie Recipe for Disaster.
The post Skirmish sim Warpips is the current Epic Games Store freebie appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Skirmish sim Warpips is the current Epic Games Store freebie

Trendy Japanese label SuperGroupies has teamed up with publisher Arc System Works to release a new line of apparel based on slick 'n' sexy fighter Guilty Gear Strive. The Guilty Gear gear is available to pre-order now ahead of its eventual release in the summer and fall seasons.

The slim-fitting jacket (available in sizes M - XXL) is outfitted in black and red and is subtly embroidered with Sol's insignia. The front pocket features the phrase "Fight Fire with Fire" and the jacket is labeled as if designed by "RIOT" — the top fashion label within the Guilty Gear universe. The Sol Badguy Model Jacket retails for $220 USD and is expected to sh…
articles.title: SuperGroupies unveils line of cool (and pricey) Guilty Gear gear

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
It's a little late to mend childhoods
The time has come for the peasants to revolt, as Ikki Unite has hit PC.
The original Ikki launched in arcades in 1985 and was quickly followed by a Nintendo Famicom version. The Famicom version is famous for being one of the first games to have had the title of “kusoge” (literal translation: crap game) bestowed upon it. The creation of the kusoge nomenclature has sometimes been attributed to Jun Miura writing about this game, but the origins are a little murky.
It seems like a strange game to return to, but in Japan, kusoge is more celebrated as a shared suffering experience. Ikki’s Famicom iteration actually sold quite well, which only solidified it in the minds of young games.
[embed]https://youtu.be/-hY370EfgDc[/embed]
Ikki Unite, however, is a larg…
articles.title: Kusoge atonement Ikki Unite now available on PC

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Employees to return to office from spring 2023
Activision Blizzard has confirmed reports that it is mandating a partial return-to-office stipulation for all of its employees from spring of this year. ABK employees will be expected to return to their workplace in April, while Blizzard workers will return in July. King staff returned back in July 2022.
The new mandate, which requests all employees attend their offices for at least three days a week, was first reported by VGC, who noted that disgruntled employees had leaked the news to social media. These employees noted that they are still concerned by the health hazards of the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, which initially forced the at-home mandate, while one Blizzard employee, @LeastMyHairIsOk, opines that many coworkers find the commute, and…
articles.title: Activision Blizzard to implement employee return-to-office mandate

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Another grab for the brass ring
Ubisoft has announced that its crossover first-person-shooter, XDefiant, will be holding its latest "Insider" playtest this week, giving its dedicated community the first opportunity to check out the crossplay functionality of the incoming military mash-up.
Announced in 2021, XDefiant — previously known as Tom Clancy's XDefiant before fans took umbrage to its quippy nature — sees operators from titles such as Rainbow Six, Splinter Cell, Ghost Recon, and other UbiShooters battle it out in six-vs-six rat-a-tat-tat action. The title is Ubisoft's latest effort to score a piece of the lucrative free-to-play pie, following on from unsuccessful ventures such as Roller Champions, Elite Squad, Hyper Scape, and canned endeavors Ghost Recon Frontline and Project Q.
htt…
articles.title: Ubisoft’s latest free-to-play effort, XDefiant, holding crossplay test

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Spring has spranged
Nintendo of Europe has announced via Twitter that the first wave of the previously announced Splatoon 3 DLC will arrive on February 28, 2023. Previously, Nintendo stated that this wave would arrive in Spring, and unless you listen to ground-dwelling marmots, that isn’t until late March.
The first of Splatoon 3’s paid DLC will be coming in two waves. As far as I can tell, this first wave contains the Inkopolis Plaza first seen in the original Splatoon. You’ll be able to see what’s happened in the past 7 or 8 Springs, catch up with the shopkeepers, and even see the Squid Sisters perform when Splatfest rolls around.
[embed]https://youtu.be/qpn0UPPvAb8[/embed]
That’s cool. That’s weird. I’ve never really thought of a lobby as paid DLC material, but maybe this is just the appetizer. There’s a second wave that will be coming along eventually, and that includes a story campaign that involves Inkopolis Square, the Splatoon 2 hub. I’m going to assume that’s where the meat of this DLC is really going to be, but Nintendo hasn’t done a super-great job of communicating that. Hopefully, we’ll finally get the ability to play as Salmonids.
Splatoon 3 is available right now on Switch. The first wave of DLC hits February 28, 2023, with the second wave coming before the end of the year.
The post The first wave of Splatoon 3 DLC surfaces February 28 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: The first wave of Splatoon 3 DLC surfaces February 28

articles.author: Chris Carter
articles.description:
Suit up again
For many, Returnal kind of came and went. Despite some of the hang-ups I had with the launch build, I stuck with it, and it was definitely worth my time. The PC edition not only benefits from a few PC-exclusive graphical tweaks, but the hindsight of fan-demanded features amid the PS5 version's patches. In other words, this sci-fi rogue is still worth playing.
[gallery columns="7" size="medium" link="file" ids="363278,363279,363280,363281,363282,363283,363284"]
Returnal PC version options
Let's touch on what the PC version offers first. While PS5 cross-play is notably missing, there's support for Ultrawide at 21:9 and Super Ultrawide at 32:9 resolution settings, a DualSense control option, AMD FSR, and Nvidia DLSS. Graphically, it's roughly inline with what Sony has offered in…
articles.title: Returnal is still very much worth playing on PC

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Making the Golden Saucer that little more golden
[Update: The PowerWash Simulator Special Midgar Pack will launch on all platforms March 2, free to all players.]
In a very fun, and very surprising piece of news, goofy window-washer PowerWash Simulator developer FuturLab has revealed that it is collaborating with Square Enix on a special Final Fantasy VII DLC expansion, which will see our crew of dirt-blasters head out to the city Midgar for some deep-cleaning action.
The new "Midgar Special Pack" DLC will give PowerWash Simulator players the opportunity to clean up some familiar locales and enemies located around the miserable, smog-covered 'berg, giving the iconic Final Fantasy VII cityscape a sparkly sheen not seen since before the arrival of capitalist scumbags Shinra. Tifa's bar, The Seventh Heaven; Cloud's motorcycle, The Hardy-Daytona' and the devastating "Guard Scorpion" robot will be among the items awaiting your jet-washing skills.
https://twitter.com/sqex_ee/status/1620252315969265665?s=20&t=0shT7d5tDKcJW45Xt5YSZg
Unfortunately, FuturLab did not offer up a trailer or release date for the new DLC, but obviously, the team wished to get the news out there on January 31, which is currently in the process of being officially designated "Final Fantasy VII Day". We'll be sure to give you a heads-up when more information on the Midgar Special Pack is available. In the meantime, you can still go and spruce up Croft Manor for yer gurl Lara.
PowerWash Simulator is available now on PlayStation, PC, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch platforms.
The post (Update) PowerWash Simulator is headed to Midgar for Final Fantasy VII DLC appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: (Update) PowerWash Simulator is headed to Midgar for Final Fantasy VII DLC

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Go face to face with Lady D
Capcom has released a new trailer for the incoming PSVR2 edition of its blockbuster horror title Resident Evil Village. In addition, the publisher announced that a free demo will be made available alongside the hardware's launch, which will take place on February 22.
The VR adaptation of Resident Evil Village will see players going face to face with the horrors of The House Beneviento like never before. Fully immersive 3D technology is expected to bolster the forests, huts, castles, and corridors for maximum player impact, allowing hapless users to come face-to-face with a gallery of infamous and terrifying villains, including Heisenberg, Lady Dimitrescu, and, yes, that baby. No Thank You. Not unless it's the puppet versions... I'd hang out with them all day.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WCxmbavVqys&t=8s&ab_channel=ResidentEvil
The PlayStation VR 2 technology launches worldwide on February 22, and is hoping to set a new market standard for immersive, responsive, virtual reality hardware. While the technology is unquestionably impressive, the PSVR2 unit's exceptionally high price, ($550 USD), will most certainly make it something of a niche purchase within an already niche community. Still, how much do you want to pay for a date with Lady D? Can you put a price on what would surely be the best, and last, night of your life?
Resident Evil Village VR Mode will officially release later in 2023, available as a free download for all Resident Evil Village players.
The post Resident Evil Village for PSVR 2 to get a spoopy demo next week appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Resident Evil Village for PSVR 2 to get a spoopy demo next week

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Feelin' Witchy
Somebody deserves a whole stack of lollipops — PlatinumGames has proudly announced that its dazzling hack 'n' slash sequel Bayonetta 3 has smashed past one million global sales. The long-long-long awaited sequel first launched on Nintendo Switch back in October 2022.
The sales milestone was modestly announced on the official PlatinumGames Twitter account, and sees the popular series' second sequel become the fastest-selling title of the Bayonetta series. The adventure sees the sultry Umbra Witch take on the powerful "Homunculi" arsenal in an effort to prevent the very tearing of space and time itself. Over the course of the story, Bayonetta is aided by friends from alternate universes, as well as a young witch-in-training known as Viola.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6RlGQM6PvHY&ab_channel=NintendoofAmerica
After what seemed like an endless wait for release, Bayonetta 3 finally launched to a mixed, but mostly positive reception from critics and fans. While most everybody was pleased with the iconic and chaotic combat, as well as its seamless integration into the mise-en-scene, many fans were left a little disappointed by the story and the overall character arc for their favorite naughty spellcaster.
The next title in the series will be spin-off release Bayonetta Origins: Cereza and The Lost Demon. This cutesy-looking title will see the young girl who would eventually become Bayonetta embark upon one of her very first adventures, exploring the Avalon forest alongside her first demon companion, Cheshire. Bayonetta Origins will launch on Nintendo Switch on March 17.
Bayonetta 3 is available right now, exclusively on Nintendo Switch.
The post Bayonetta 3 smashes past one million sales appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Bayonetta 3 smashes past one million sales

articles.author: Brett Medlock
articles.description:
Inconsistent definitions
Welcome back! It’s time for a new episode of the Spot Dodge Podcast exclusively on Destructoid. Topics: Tonight we’ll be talking all about the magnificent and recently stealth-released Metroid Prime Remastered. Along with that, the team discusses the difference between a remaster and a remake -- And how even game devs are split on the meaning.

I know what you're thinking, the difference between a remaster and a remake is clear. A game like Wind Waker HD is a remaster and Resident Evil 2 (2019) is a remake. Wind Waker retained the same skeleton as the original but overhauled the graphics. Essentially being 90% the same game. Whereas Resident Evil 2 was a full reimagining of the original game. With ne…
articles.title: Even game studios are defining remakes/remasters differently

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Prime cuts
While rumors that had been swirling for years pointed to the likelihood of a port of 2009’s Metroid Prime Trilogy, Nintendo surprised us by dropping Metroid Prime Remastered instead. This is entirely unlike Nintendo for a few reasons. Mostly, it’s because Metroid Prime Remastered isn’t just a port. They actually went to the effort of gussying up to the nines. Weirder yet, they aren’t charging some sort of premium for it or even full price. Sometimes they pretend that Metroid doesn’t even exist. Is this a mistake?
In any case, I love Metroid Prime. The GameCube had a lot of momentum coming out of the gate, giving fans a lot to draw their focus away from what was happening on other platforms. Metroid Prime dropped in North America, exactly one year after the continent got the cons…
articles.title: Review: Metroid Prime Remastered

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Batter up with dinky dudes for a dinky price
Global baseball aficionados can finally experience the excitement of Konami's cutesy release WSBC eBaseball: Power Pros, which is now available on PS4 and Nintendo Switch. This release — announced during last week's Nintendo Direct presentation — marks the official debut of the long-running franchise on the international stage for the first time since its 1994 inception.
eBaseball: Power Pros, officially recognized by The World Baseball Softball Confederation (WSBC) is a scaled-down version of the classic sport, featuring simple-to-learn controls, adorable chibi characters, and a huge roster of 300 characters. Form your team, take to the diamond, and become the most famous baseball team on the planet.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZaS-0ZCbAYM&ab_channel=NintendoofAmerica
Alternately, multiplayer support allows for up to four players to team up for online and offline action, battering up for some friendly competition, or entering online tournaments via the new Championship Mode. Wade through the statistics of the title's mammoth roster to ensure that you synergize the best pitchers, catchers, batters, and backstops in the business. For such a tiny title, WSBC eBaseball: Power Pros looks to have a pretty big personality.
Best of all, it will cost interested parties very little to get in on the action. WSBC eBaseball: Power Pros is currently available from PSN and the Nintendo eShop for a single dollar (though some global markets will have to abide by their territory's "minimum pricing" laws). So it won't break the bank to get you and your pals out and into the dugout. Swing, batter, batter, batter, batter...
The post eBaseball: Power Pros now available on PS4 and Switch appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: eBaseball: Power Pros now available on PS4 and Switch

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
A new development in the controversy surrounding Mundfish
Mick Gordon, the composer for Mundfish’s upcoming FPS, Atomic Heart, has announced that he will be donating the fees her received for scoring the game to the Austrailian Red Cross' Ukraine Crisis Appeal for use in their humanitarian efforts in Ukraine.
[embed]https://twitter.com/Mick_Gordon/status/1625495826247319556?s=20[/embed]
The announcement is significant as it comes following the concern that developer Mundfish is allegedly supported by investors with hands in Russia’s war in Ukraine; or that funds from Atomic Heart’s sales may directly help the Russian government. While Mundfish is based in Cyprus, there have been allegations that it's mainly headquartered in Moscow.
Moreover, the studio allegedly has investors that have relations with Russian state-owned energy corporation Gazprom. While nothing has been directly proven, a lot of allegations have been brought up, and Mundfish hasn’t exactly stepped in to set the record straight itself, stating that it simply does “not comment on politics.”
While Mick Gordon has not specifically commented on these accusations, this move is at least one that may help offset some of the concerns. However, it’s not the same as if Mundfish itself donated proceeds to aid Ukraine. I would encourage you to do your own research into Mundfish’s connection with the war in Ukraine, reach your own conclusions, and decide for yourself if purchasing Atomic Heart is reasonably moral for you.
Mick Gordon has scored titles such as Wolfenstein: The New Order, Killer Instinct, and Doom Eternal. Atomic Heart is available February 21 for PC, PlayStation, and Xbox platforms.
The post Atomic Heart composer Mick Gordon to donate fees to Red Cross for Ukraine appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Atomic Heart composer Mick Gordon to donate fees to Red Cross for Ukraine

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Subscription service takes a bite out of game sales
Xbox has confirmed that the launch of its hugely successful Xbox Game Pass subscription service has had a notable negative impact on the long-term sales prospects of many of the titles added to its rotating catalog of games.
The admission comes as part of a report by The UK Competition and Markets Authority, (as seen by GamesIndustry.biz) which was commissioned as part of Microsoft's proposed purchase of publisher Activision Blizzard. According to the report, many titles that were made temporarily available in the Game Pass service then saw a decline in physical/digital sales for the 12-month period following their removal from the service.
The average percentage by which sales have declined was redacted from the record.
While it would ma…
articles.title: Xbox confirms the Game Pass model impacts long-term game sales

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
What is a man? A miserable pile of smooches!
It might be Valentine’s Day, but we’re going to have to wait a bit longer for that love blood to hit the water. The Deep End Games and 2124 Publishing has announced that Romancelvania, their unholy cross-breed of Metroidvania and dating sim, will be hitting the bedsheets March 7, 2023.
Romancelvania introduces us to a Dracula whose confidence is still laid up after a savage beating at the hands of the Van Helsing clan. Their lover left them, their minions don’t respect them, and evil just doesn’t have the same appeal anymore. Death gets fed up with this pity party and sets Dracula up with their own dating show. It’s time to choose from 12 “lucky” singles and help the dark lord (or lady) get their mojo back. Peer pressure is the proven way to turn a spark into a flame.
[embed]https://youtu.be/-iJkv94HlBA[/embed]
Gameplay is a clever combination of gated exploration and choice-driven dialogue. You’re given the option to choose a body type, and the dating options cover whatever it is you’re into, whether you’re more a Medusa or werewolf kind of person. The whole affair is fully voiced, which is an appreciated bit of extra effort.
It feels like simultaneously forever and not that long ago that I played the demo and came away impressed but skeptical. The whole concept seems like it will be extremely difficult to get right, given the amount of player agency available and the two disparate genres that are trying to be married. However, nothing about the demo implied that The Deep End Games is in over the depth, so provided the rest of the game matches the bar set by the earlier peek we got, then we’re in for a real treat.
Romancelvania is out on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC on March 7.
The post Romancelvania brings the vampire smooching March 7 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Romancelvania brings the vampire smooching March 7

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Paradise Lost
This week sees the launch of Electronic Arts period-piece adventure Wild Hearts, the mythical action-RPG set within the age of feudal Japan — Developer Omega Force, of Dynasty Warriors fame, has released a new trailer introducing players to the village and people of Minato, located deep within the beautiful overworld known as Azuma.
Wild Hearts will present players will a fresh take on the... well... the Monster Hunting genre that has proven especially popular in recent years. The player will take up the mantle of a custom hunter, and team with the people of Minato on a quest to track and defeat a menagerie of behemoth beasts known as "The Kemono" — utilizing each creature's soulful "Celestial Thread" in order to renovate and rebuild the province of Azuma before it is lost completely.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_grFGQ2oWUQ&t
As you can see from the trailer above, Wild Hearts will boast some amazing and awe-inspiring creature designs, while offering up a selection of varied weaponry, gear, and elemental skills in order to aid our hunters in their battles with these incredible land gods. From the village of Minato, the player will enlist the help of various arts, from alchemists to healers, blacksmiths to guides, in order to best prepare for the long and hazardous journeys that lie ahead.
Hone finely crafted skills of the "Karakuri" in order to build a variety of environmental traps and defenses, and experiment with a wide arsenal of weapons in order to best equip you and your party for the hunt. And looking at some of the monsters on display in this preview, you're probably going to need all of the help you can get. I mean, I'd come with you, but I've got a bit of a bad back. There in spirit, though.
Wild Hearts launches February 17 on PS5, PC, and Xbox Series X. Be sure to check out our own Chris Carter's initial thoughts in his Review-in-Progress.
The post Wild Hearts trailer introduces the village and people of Minato appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Wild Hearts trailer introduces the village and people of Minato

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
St. Valentine's Day Massacre
The sequence comes around an hour into the story and lasts approximately 95 seconds. Lieutenant Hannah Stone, freshly showered from another terrible, violent day on the job, walks into the cafeteria of her headquarters for dinner. At the counter, she is handed fish soup, Bratwurst curry with potatoes, a blackcurrant jelly, and a steaming cup of coffee. Well earned.
Taking a seat at an empty table, Hannah stares at the bowl. Atop her soup is a severed fish head. It stares at her. Hannah looks it in the eye, which peers back into her soul. Hollow. Unblinking. Accusing. Hannah discards the soup to one side, where even a hungry cat decides not to partake in the free meal. Picking up her fork, Hannah stabs it into the bratwurst, or at least attempts to, as the cutle…
articles.title: Review: Wanted: Dead

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Sure beats a bunch of photoshopped heads
As Illumination continues to ramp up the marketing campaign for its upcoming release The Super Mario Bros. Movie, the studio has released a series of character posters spotlighting the Mushroom Kingdom and the heroes and villains that reside within.
The posters are strikingly attractive, packed out with color and dynamism, and see protagonists such as Mario, Luigi, Toad, and Princess Peach headed out to battle with the likes of Donkey Kong, Shy Guy, Magikoopa, and, of course, Big Bad Bowser himself. Each poster spotlights a particular character and world — from Rainbow Road, to Donkey Kong Island, to Bowser's Castle — with each image hoping to get fans' hype engines suitably in gear for the movie's spring release.
https://twitter.com/supermariomovie/status/1624136305297981440?s=20&t=U6IBLXcUhvcEqQ_ibx5mlw
I think my favorite is Peach ridin' the Rainbow Road, I love the bright colours and the wild perspective. The drama of the Bowser's Army image is also top-tier. The poster which sees Peach, Toad, and Mario all sat admiring the Mushroom Kingdom is quite lovely. A text-free version of that would look great on the wall of any video game fan.
Take a look at the posters in the tweets below and see which is your pick of the bunch.
Mario
Luigi
Peach
Toad
Bowser
Donkey Kong
Group Shot
Mushroom Kingdom
Bowser's Army
The Super Mario Bros. Movie stars Chris Pratt (Mario), Anya Taylor-Joy (Peach), Keegan Michael-Key (Toad), Jack Black (Bowser), Seth Rogan (Donkey Kong), and Charlie Day (Luigi). It is scheduled to launch in theaters in the UK and Europe in late-March. It will premiere in North America on April 7.
Oh, and be sure to check out the easter-egg-filled Super Bowl ad.
The post The new Super Mario Bros. Movie posters are a delight appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: The new Super Mario Bros. Movie posters are a delight

articles.author: Sorrel Kerr-Jung
articles.description:
Not every Final Fantasy game is great, but maybe every Final Fantasy game is great
Last year, I visited Heinz Hall in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania to see the 35th-anniversary edition of the Distant Worlds: Music from Final Fantasy concert series. I don't love every Final Fantasy game, but sitting in that concert hall, with a comically overpriced music box in a bag at my feet, for a couple of hours, I did. And when I play Theatrhythm Final Bar Line, I love every Final Fantasy game again.
Depending on which games you want to count, Theatrhythm Final Bar Line, a mechanical celebration of the music of Final Fantasy, is somewhere between the third and seventh Theatrhythm game. I love the series — developer indieszero has an impressive understanding of what makes music interesting, and these games h…
articles.title: Review: Theatrhythm Final Bar Line

articles.author: Cheri Faulkner

What does it mean?!
On February 12, 2023, Destiny 2 game director Joe Blackburn posted a cryptic tweet featuring nothing but a plain wall with a sticky note attached to it. Seemingly uneventful, right? Well, not exactly. That sticky note promised a "State of the Game" post on Bungie's website for the following day consisting of no less than 5,300 words, covering Destiny 2 Lightfall and the year ahead.
For those new to these articles, every now and then the Destiny developer team will share a blog on the state of the game, the future as they see it, and changes coming to future expansions. Generally speaking, these blog posts come about once every year or two, have plenty of detail, the contents are rarely if ever leaked, and it usually spells exciting new directions for the game.
Expand pl…
articles.title: Destiny 2: State of the Game – Lightfall & the year ahead

articles.author: Eric Van Allen
articles.description:
Please insert credits
Metroid Prime Remastered shadow-dropped as part of last week's Nintendo Direct. And while players have been enjoying the refreshed version of Samus' adventure, some developers are calling out issues with credits for the work on both Metroid Prime Remastered and its origins.
Former Prime developer Zoid Kirsch shared this screenshot of the credits over the weekend, which uses a blanket phrase to credit the teams that worked on both Metroid Prime and its Wii version.
"While many studios did amazing work on the remaster, I'm letdown Metroid Prime's Remaster does not include the full original game credits," said Kirsch. "I worked with so many amazing people on the game and everyone's name should be included in the remaster, not just a single card like this."
You can see the credits for yourself in uploaded game completion VODs like this one. Though it attributes Retro staff, as well as Airship Images Limited, Gamesim, Iron Galaxy Studios, and others who worked on the project, it does close with one solitary block for the original GameCube game and the Wii version.
Former developer Jack Mathews called it a travesty, not just for his own work on the original that could have been replaced, but for others' that may have stuck through to the final remaster.
The credits issue in games
Games have, historically, had issues with crediting the work developers have done on them. Reports at sites like Kotaku have highlighted how credit for contributions have been used as both rewards and punitive measures.
Metroid as a series even encountered this with Dread, as several developers claimed they weren't credits for their work on the project. Other developers have also seen accusations of withholding credits.
The post Original Metroid Prime devs call out lack of full credits in the remaster appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Original Metroid Prime devs call out lack of full credits in the remaster

Kyuukyoku no kusoge
I first heard of Ganso Saiyuuki Super Monkey Daibouken on Game Centre CX where it was introduced as “kyuukyoku no kusoge” or “ultimate crappy game.” The host, Shinya Arino, tackled it as part of a segment that ran throughout 9 of the 10 episodes of season 3 (2005). The concept of the segment is that he’d try to tackle the game, and every time he’d get stuck or confused, he’d call a viewer to get hints on what to do.
He was eventually able to complete the game, but Super Monkey Daibouken is so incomprehensible that, in one of the episodes, he made absolutely no progress, and none of the viewers could help him.
I decided that I’d try that out for myself. Obviously, no one views me (that I know of), so my goal was to complete the game using the same viewer hints that Arino…
